name: LyricLover
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lyric lover
des: Lyric Lover is a game for those that really pay attention to the lyrics of songs. We recite the lyrics and you tell us the artists, song titles and albums these lyrics came from. Compete against your own high score or challenge others to determine who is the supreme Lyric Lover!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
